body:
Initially when splitting `py-xenv` from `gaudi`, there were some problems with the then most up-to-date version of `py-xenv`, which have since been fixed. Since version 1.0.0 has also been released on PyPI, we make use of it here as well.

Also updating `gaudi` to use a newer version of `py-xenv`.
title: [py-xenv] Introduce version 1.0.0
